short: We can take the process of studying color further by including larger collections of colors in our dataset. Here, we provide several different color schemes that can be selected. After running the model, the visualize on the left will show images for which at least 0.1% of the pixels in the image is close to the selected color.
long: We can take the process of studying color further by including larger collections of colors in our dataset. Here, we provide several different color schemes that can be selected. After running the model, the visualize on the left will show images for which at least 0.1% of the pixels in the image is close to the selected color.
